title: Computer Model-Based Science Education Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science theory comprehension and computer literacy
context.additional_context: Support for personalized device usage and collaborative learning environments, with continuous feedback via formative assessment

learning_goals: Cultivating the ability to analyze curricular content using computer models that explain scientific phenomena.
Acquiring the competency to design and implement modeling-based PBL (Project-Based Learning) projects.
Developing instructional strategies aligned with learners' comprehension levels when designing computer model-integrated lessons.

resources: Open-source computer modeling tools (e.g., PhET simulations)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
